title: Intro to Linear Algebra
description: An introduction to linear alegbra including eigenvalues and eigenvectors, applications to linear systems, least squares. Credit not awarded for both MATH 1553 and MATH 1522, MATH 1502, MATH 1504, MATH 1512, MATH 1554 or MATH 1564.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 1113 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 11X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) or SAT Mathematics 600 or MATH SECTION SCORE 620 or Converted ACT Math 600 or ACT Math 26 or MATH 15X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
